subject: Appointment of DGMs of NHAI by Govt of Haryana as Director
text: HTd4 <cfl4 <TaHn %rfaczut Ph :91-11-508039 91-11-5080981 (7E+ Wa6A 3 {iurff TTT4) 91-11-508035' National Highways Authority of India Fax 91-11-508046( (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 91-11-508043. 91-11-5080360 G-5 SECTOA.10. DWAAKA NEW DELHI-110045 No.11041/21/2002-Admn.III November 25,2002 POLICY MATTERS ADMNISTRATIONIFINANCE (2442002) (Decision taken on C.M. Division's File NoNHAIICMIDGMIGen./2002) In pursuance to the Delegation of Powers under the Punjab Scheduled Road and Controlled Areas Restriction of Unregulated Development Act, 1963 and Notification No.DTPC-STP(E)-Misc-73/3284 dated 24.09.2002, the Government of Haryana has appointed Deputy General Managers of National Highways Authority of India in respect of National Highway No. 1_ 2 and 8 passing through the State of Haryana; to exercise and perform all the powers and functions of the Director under Sections-9 and 12 of the Act within their respective jurisdiction Or portion thereof inside the controlled areas, declared under Section-4 of the Act. 2_ copy of the Haryana Government notification dated 24.09.2002 and the provisions of Sections-4, 9 and 12 of the Act are annexed herewith for information and needful.
